episodes.title: WT History Interviews Professor M. James Penton (Discussion 28 Part 1)
episodes.description: Join us as we discuss with Professor James Penton, author of such books as Jehovah's Witnesses in Canada, Apocalypse Delayed, and Jehovah's Witnesses and the Third Reich. We talk about his own personal history, Jehovah's Witness history, and what he's up to now.

episodes.title: What Was Watchtower's Third Trumpet? Indictments, Accusations & Prohibition (Discussion 22 Part 1)
episodes.description:
In our discussion on Watchtower's First Trumpet blast we looked at why the declaration of the challenge to world leaders and convention was so important to Watchtower. 

It was the 1923 Los Angeles convention when the Watchtower's second trumpet was released that the interpretation of the Parable of the Sheep and Goats became more Watchtower centered. 

Join us for our discussion of our investigation into Watchtower's 1924 Columbus Convention. What Was Watchtower's Third Trumpet? - Indictments, Accusations & Prohibition
